basics.name: Michael J. Troup
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I have worked primarily as a C#/.Net developer for many years. I have extensive experience working with web technologies including ASP.Net, MVC, WPF, and Web API. I am currently working as a backend web services developer working with Scala and AWS Lambda.

references.reference: Mike has been a key contributor to many of my teams over the last decade. He has a natural ability to identify the root cause of issues and create technical solutions that are easy to maintain and scale. Mike has a broad software development background and is always learning new technologies and methodologies to benefit our company and his team.
references.name: Contact Available Upon Request

highlights: Built a framework to be used by internal business partners to add additional services to our platform
Migrated an internal web interface to a single page application using Angular and TypeScript
work.summary: Built a REST based web services interface to an in-house revenue cycle management system to support the implementation of an electronic medical records system for a large provider of specialty care.

highlights: Converted a complex web application to AngularJS 1.x and TypeScript
Led a team responsible for the design, development, and support of an internal CRM system used by all Advance Auto Parts stores
work.summary: Responsible for the design, development, and technical leadership of a number of websites and web applications for the Advance Auto Parts automotive retail division.
